title: post_auto_straighten
description: Initiates an asynchronous job to run auto straighten

uprightMode.description: The upright mode to use. If you have the options block, then this is a required field. If options block is not specified, then the appropriate upright mode will automatically be selected.

constrainCrop.description: If the straightened image should be constrain cropped, to remove all blank edges around an image.
